predictions.text: COMEX gold front-month futures (CME: GC) will settle at or above $4,200.00 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME Group official daily settlement for the active front-month GC futures contract; any settlement >= 4200.00 USD/oz on or before 2025-11-30 UTC counts.
predictions.rationale: Gold above $4,000 with safe-haven demand and central-bank buying; a modest incremental spike is plausible if real yields soften or geopolitical stress rises.

predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month crude will settle at or above $86.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via ICE official settlement for Brent front-month futures; any settlement >= 86.00 USD/bbl by 2025-11-30 UTC qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Heightened Hormuz shipping risk can add a risk premium to crude into month-end.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or below $90,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko daily UTC candles; any daily low <= 90,000.00 USD on or before 2025-11-30 UTC satisfies.
predictions.rationale: Crypto sold off with risk assets; another ~5% drawdown is plausible amid elevated volatility and macro uncertainty.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-15 close to 2025-12-15 close, Alphabet Inc. Class A (GOOGL) adjusted-close total return will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare adjusted-close prices (dividends/splits) from a reputable source (e.g., Nasdaq/Yahoo Finance). Compute percentage change from 2025-11-15 close to 2025-12-15 close; if GOOGL − SPY >= 2.0 pp, count as true.
predictions.rationale: A new Berkshire stake can catalyze incremental flows and sentiment into year-end.

predictions.text: The AAA U.S. national average price for regular gasoline will print at or below $3.00 per gallon on at least one reporting date by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via AAA Gas Prices national average. Any daily national average <= $3.000 by 2025-12-31 qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand softness and stable crude could push the national average to a 3-handle by year-end.

predictions.text: TSA daily U.S. checkpoint throughput will reach at least 3,200,000 passengers on at least one day between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-01 (U.S. reporting dates).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use TSA’s daily ‘Passenger Volumes’ page; any U.S. date within 2025-11-22 to 2025-12-01 with total throughput >= 3,200,000 satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Advance airline schedules and load factors
predictions.rationale: Thanksgiving travel often sets records; continued demand growth increases odds of a new throughput high.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 24.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Cboe official VIX closing values; any close >= 24.00 by 2025-12-15 UTC counts.
predictions.rationale: Macro uncertainty and thin year-end liquidity raise odds of a volatility spike.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-15, OFAC will announce at least one new Venezuela-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check Treasury press releases and OFAC Recent Actions for designations tagged to the Venezuela sanctions program; any new SDN listing qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Policy oscillates between relief and pressure; slippage on commitments could trigger new designations.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-15, WhatsApp will enable third-party chat integration for users in the EU, confirmed via an official WhatsApp or Meta blog/help-center post.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official Meta/WhatsApp announcement confirming live availability of third-party chat integration in the EU suffices; third-party reports alone do not.
monitoring_signals: Meta Newsroom and WhatsApp blog updates
App UI toggles and help-center documentation
predictions.rationale: DMA compliance pressure and company signaling of an imminent launch support a near-term rollout.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA MOVE Index will close at or below 85.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Data Indices official daily close for the MOVE Index; any close <= 85.0 by 2025-12-31 UTC qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Fed communication and policy path clarity
predictions.rationale: If data flow normalizes and Fed guidance steadies, rates volatility can compress into year-end.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €45.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Endex official settlement for Dutch TTF front-month; any settlement >= €45.00/MWh by 2025-12-31 UTC counts.
predictions.rationale: A colder-than-normal start to winter or supply hiccups could briefly reintroduce price risk premia.
